data.text: @THEBlGMISS @_ericting Much of this data is released by government gatekeepers, but the data sourcing processes and statistical presentation is highly manipulated to reflect the government's actions and policies in a favorable light.

@_ericting Any data about who died? Are reported deaths broken out by vaccination status and then by age, comorbidities, etc? In other words, is the same population - regardless of vaccination status - who died?
@_ericting Oakland still requires it.  So dumb
@_ericting It's almost like all the lockdowns and rules didn't stop the virus.
